subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ichiro Suzuki’s homer in the ninth, the last of four by the Yankees, produced a 4-3 win over the Rangers on a night when Brian Cashman ripped a loose-lipped Alex Rodriguez.
snippet: Ichiro Suzuki’s homer in the ninth, the last of four by the Yankees, produced a 4-3 win over the Rangers on a night when Brian Cashman ripped a loose-lipped Alex Rodriguez.
